title: Montana governor orders 1 million residents to stay at home
description: HELENA, Mont. (AP) — Montana Gov. Steve Bullock on Thursday ordered the state’s 1 million residents to stay in their homes in a stepped-up effort to fight the spread of the coronavirus.
content:
HELENA, Mont. (AP) Montana Gov. Steve Bullock on Thursday ordered the states 1 million residents to stay in their homes in a stepped-up effort to fight the spread of the coronavirus.
The stay-at-home order goes into effect Saturday . Under it, people will be… [+1148 chars]
